channel.title: CVE Feed for simpleSAMLphp Authentication -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for simpleSAMLphp Authentication -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-38320|2024-08-04T01:37:16.301Z -- simplesamlphp%20authentication -- simplesamlphp%20authentication
item.description: The simpleSAMLphp Authentication WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to a reflected $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"] value in the ~/simplesamlphp-authentication.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 0.7.0.
